function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Default a/c settings leading to high electricity consumption","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Respondents planning to travel despite covid-19 risk","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance of disease outbreaks in residential communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High social activity and high population density contributing to covid-19 infections","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on the effect of biodiversity on human health rather than considering both dimensions simultaneously","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Smart mobility restrictions may not be effectively implemented, leading to continued spread of the virus through transportation modes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of water-borne diseases due to ineffective water quality management","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cutting public social expenditures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low number of respondents with phd level of education may result in a lack of expertise in public health and disease control within the construction workforce","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Weak public health surveillance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of r2 values for fixed-lag lengths","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Urban planning and design failure to address scarcity of green space.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher levels of stress and ptsd associated with gender, age, income, and education","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of sars cov-2 coronavirus pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing and handling physical documents or materials during the research process may create opportunities for the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in quantifying environmental psychology factors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transport systems as vectors for disease spread within cities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the impact of building design on contagious disease propagation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher education and knowledge in urban planning may lead to overconfidence in understanding disease transmission dynamics in u urban public parks.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in current residential buildings to current and future pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unrestricted access to disease data for public use may pose a risk of misinterpretation or misrepresentation, leading to panic or false conclusions.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unintended effects of stay at home orders leading to increased domestic violence globally","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inappropriate adaptation of pandemic messages to local culture","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slow assimilation of green building strategies within existing design context","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of global response to climate change","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of self-reported health ratings as opposed to objective health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of local cultures and traditions in the pursuit of tourism experiences.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adaptation strategies for service organizations to cope with covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on non-capital cities and small cities in policy and research agendas","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Storage of dust samples at 280°c","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with contaminated surfaces in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 due to increased contagion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engagement with local community members and institutions can create opportunities for disease spread if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survivalist consumers panic buying due to anxiety about limited service appointments.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air stagnation in confined spaces with high patient exhaled airborne viral loads","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to sars-cov-2 in hospital schools.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion and vulnerability of migrants and gig workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Green result in skepticism and resistance to using the system for evaluating designs.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence of new strains of sars-cov-2, such as
